plot: Awkward college boy loves awkward college girl, but doesn't know how to approach her. Eventually, his buddies attempt to play cupid in this whimsical low-budget comedy.
title: The Life and Times of Chester-Angus Ramsgood
plot_es: Awkward college boy loves awkward college girl, but doesn't know how to approach her. Eventually, his buddies attempt to play cupid in this whimsical low-budget comedy.
original_name: The Life and Times of Chester-Angus Ramsgood
plot_en: Awkward college boy loves awkward college girl, but doesn't know how to approach her. Eventually, his buddies attempt to play cupid in this whimsical low-budget comedy.
